an6.49:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an6.49:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca khemo ayasma ca sumano savatthiyam viharanti andhavanasmim.
an6.49:1.3: Atha kho ayasma ca khemo ayasma ca sumano yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma khemo bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.49:2.1: “Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto tassa na evam hoti:
an6.49:2.2: ‘atthi me seyyoti va atthi me sadisoti va atthi me hinoti va’”ti.
an6.49:2.5: Atha kho ayasma khemo “samanunno me sattha”ti utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an6.49:3.1: Atha kho ayasma sumano acirapakkante ayasmante kheme bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.49:3.2: “yo so, bhante, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto tassa na evam hoti:
an6.49:3.3: ‘natthi me seyyoti va natthi me sadisoti va natthi me hinoti va’”ti.
an6.49:3.6: Atha kho ayasma sumano “samanunno me sattha”ti utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an6.49:4.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkantesu ayasmante ca kheme ayasmante ca sumane bhikkhu amantesi:
an6.49:4.3: Attho ca vutto atta ca anupanito.
an6.49:4.4: Atha ca pana idhekacce moghapurisa hasamanaka manne annam byakaronti.
